dao.name: AddCStyle
dao.statement: insert into cal_style(seq,cgySeq,name,optPicture,hpicture,lpicture,rectTop,rectLeft,rectWidth,rectHeight, textTop,textLeft,textWidth,textHeight,kinds,adminSeq,createDate,updateDate,type) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

dao.name: RemoveCStyle
dao.statement: update cal_style set status=0 where seq=?

dao.name: RemoveCStyleByAdminSeq
dao.statement: update cal_style set status=0 where seq=? and adminSeq=?

dao.name: UpdateCStyle
dao.statement: update cal_style set cgySeq=?, name=?,optPicture=?,hpicture=?,lpicture=?,lwidth=?,lheight=?,rectTop=?,rectLeft=?,rectWidth=?, rectHeight=?,textTop=?,textLeft=?,textWidth=?,textHeight=?,auth=?,updateDate=?,designInfo=?,designDescription=?,type=?,productKind=? where seq=?

dao.name: QueryAllCStyle
dao.statement: select a.*,b.name cgyName from cal_style a left join cal_style_cgy b on a.cgySeq=b.seq where a.status=1

dao.name: QueryAllCStyleAndType
dao.statement: select a.*,b.name cgyName from cal_style a left join cal_style_cgy b on a.cgySeq=b.seq where a.status=1 and a.type = ?

dao.name: QueryAllCStyle2
dao.statement: select * from cal_style

dao.name: QueryAllCStyleByAdminSeq
dao.statement: select a.*,b.name cgyName from cal_style a left join cal_style_cgy b on a.cgySeq=b.seq where a.status=1 and a.adminSeq=?

dao.name: QueryAllCStyleByAdminSeqAndType
dao.statement: select a.*,b.name cgyName from cal_style a left join cal_style_cgy b on a.cgySeq=b.seq where a.status=1 and a.adminSeq=? and a.type = ?

dao.name: QueryCStyleByCgy
dao.statement: select a.*,b.name cgyName from cal_style a left join cal_style_cgy b on a.cgySeq=b.seq where a.status=1 and a.cgySeq=? and a.kinds=?

dao.name: QueryCStyleByCgyAndAuth
dao.statement: select a.*,b.name cgyName from cal_style a left join cal_style_cgy b on a.cgySeq=b.seq where a.status=1 and a.cgySeq=? and (kinds=0 or auth like ? or auth like '%,ALL,%') order by a.name

dao.name: QueryCStyleByCgyAndAuthAndPrK
dao.statement: select a.*,b.name cgyName from cal_style a left join cal_style_cgy b on a.cgySeq=b.seq where a.status=1 and a.cgySeq=? and (kinds=0 or auth like ? or auth like '%,ALL,%') and (productKind like ? or productKind like '%,0,%') order by a.name

dao.name: QueryCStyleByCgyAndAuthAndType
dao.statement: select a.*,b.name cgyName from cal_style a left join cal_style_cgy b on a.cgySeq=b.seq where a.status=1 and a.cgySeq=? and a.type = ? and (kinds=0 or auth like ? or auth like '%,ALL,%') order by a.name

dao.name: QueryCStyleByAuth
dao.statement: select a.*,b.name cgyName from cal_style a left join cal_style_cgy b on a.cgySeq=b.seq where a.status=1 and (kinds=0 or auth like ? or auth like '%,ALL,%') order by a.name

dao.name: QueryCStyleByAuthAndPrK
dao.statement: select a.*,b.name cgyName from cal_style a left join cal_style_cgy b on a.cgySeq=b.seq where a.status=1 and (kinds=0 or auth like ? or auth like '%,ALL,%') and (productKind like ? or productKind like '%,0,%') order by a.name

dao.name: QueryCStyleByAuthAndType
dao.statement: select a.*,b.name cgyName from cal_style a left join cal_style_cgy b on a.cgySeq=b.seq where a.status=1 and a.type = ? and (kinds=0 or auth like ? or auth like '%,ALL,%') order by a.name

dao.name: QueryCStyleByKinds
dao.statement: select a.*,b.name cgyName from cal_style a left join cal_style_cgy b on a.cgySeq=b.seq where a.status=1 and a.kinds=?

dao.name: QueryCStyleByKindsAndAuth
dao.statement: select a.*,b.name cgyName from cal_style a left join cal_style_cgy b on a.cgySeq=b.seq where a.status=1 and a.kinds=? and (auth like ? or auth like '%,ALL,%')

dao.name: QueryCStyle2
dao.statement: select a.*,b.name cgyName from cal_style a left join cal_style_cgy b on a.cgySeq=b.seq where a.status=1 and a.seq=?

dao.name: QueryCStyle
dao.statement: select * from cal_style where seq=?

dao.name: QueryCSLayout
dao.statement: select * from cal_slayout where styleSeq=?

dao.name: QueryCSLayout2
dao.statement: select seq,preview,stable from cal_slayout where styleSeq=? order by createDate desc

dao.name: QueryCSLayoutByKinds
dao.statement: select a.*,b.preview from cal_style a,cal_slayout b where a.seq = b.styleSeq and a.kinds=?

dao.name: QueryCSLayoutByCgyAndKinds
dao.statement: select a.*,b.preview from cal_style a,cal_slayout b where a.seq = b.styleSeq and a.cgySeq=? and a.kinds=?

dao.name: QueryCSLayoutByCgyAndKinds2
dao.statement: select a.*,b.preview from cal_style a,cal_slayout b where a.seq = b.styleSeq and a.cgySeq=? and a.kinds=? and (auth like ? or auth like '%,ALL,%')

dao.name: QueryCSLayoutByKindsAndAuth
dao.statement: select a.*,b.preview from cal_style a,cal_slayout b where a.seq = b.styleSeq and a.kinds=? and (auth like ? or auth like '%,ALL,%')

dao.name: QueryCSLayoutBySeq
dao.statement: select * from cal_slayout where seq=?

dao.name: QueryAllCSLayout
dao.statement: select * from cal_slayout

dao.name: AddCSLayout
dao.statement: insert into cal_slayout(seq,styleSeq,layoutSeq,preview,leftPicture,rightPicture,leftPicture2,rightPicture2,stable,createDate,updateDate) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

dao.name: UpdateCSLayout
dao.statement: update cal_slayout set styleSeq=?,layoutSeq=?,preview=?,leftPicture=?,rightPicture=?,leftPicture2=?,rightPicture2=?, stable=?,updateDate=? where seq=?

dao.name: UpdateCSLayoutDeploy
dao.statement: update cal_slayout set deploy=?,updateDate=? where seq=?

dao.name: DeleteCSLayout
dao.statement: delete from cal_slayout where seq=?

dao.name: AddCSRect
dao.statement: insert into cal_srect(styleLayoutSeq,positions,rectTop,rectLeft,rectWidth,rectHeight,captionTop,captionLeft,captionWidth,captionHeight,createDate,updateDate) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

dao.name: DeleteCSRect
dao.statement: delete from cal_srect where styleLayoutSeq=?

dao.name: QueryCSRect
dao.statement: select * from cal_srect where styleLayoutSeq=? and positions=?

dao.name: AddCStyleCgy
dao.statement: insert into cal_style_cgy(seq,name,createDate,updateDate) values(?,?,?,?)

dao.name: DeleteCStyleCgy
dao.statement: delete from cal_style_cgy where seq=?

dao.name: RemoveCStyleCgy
dao.statement: update cal_style_cgy set status=0,updateDate=? where seq=?

dao.name: UpdateCStyleCgy
dao.statement: update cal_style_cgy set name=?,updateDate=? where seq=?

dao.name: QueryAllCStyleCgy
dao.statement: select * from cal_style_cgy where status = 1

dao.name: QueryCStyleCgy
dao.statement: select * from cal_style_cgy where status = 1 and seq = ?
